name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior QA Tester with 13+ years of experience in delivering robust and compliant applications, particularly within the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in testing methodologies using **Selenium**, **Cucumber**, and **REST** APIs, ensuring high-quality delivery through meticulous **API testing**, including validation of **JSON** and **XML** formats. Skilled in **RDBMS**, **SQL**, and data migration processes, with a focus on **Agile methodologies** and **DevOps** practices to enhance collaborative project workflows.

Demonstrated analytical skills in identifying defects and improving testing efficiencies, supported by effective communication skills for cross-team collaboration. Additionally, leverage a strong technical foundation with hands-on expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, along with cloud deployment experience on **AWS** and **Azure**. Have successfully contributed to building AI/ML-powered platforms, enhancing operational capabilities through predictive analytics.

experience.responsibilities:
Executed comprehensive **API testing** strategies utilizing **Java** and **Selenium** to ensure seamless integration across systems, achieving a **95%** pass rate in all test cases.
Conducted detailed **data migration** processes, leveraging **RDBMS** and **SQL** to maintain data accuracy and integrity during transitions, with a focus on cleaning and transforming datasets that reduced data inconsistency by **30%**.
Collaborated within **Agile methodologies** to deliver project milestones in an iterative manner, leading to a **25%** increase in team productivity through enhanced communication and workflows in **JIRA** and **Atlassian Confluence**.
Implemented automated testing frameworks using **Cucumber** and **Selenium**, enabling **70%** of test cases to be executed with minimal manual intervention, speeding up release cycles significantly.
Led the development of test plans for **REST** and **SOAP** APIs, covering both **JSON** and **XML** formats, ensuring compliance with **HTTP** standards and validating end-to-end scenarios through structured workflows.
Performed rigorous testing of system functionalities in a **Unix** environment, utilizing **Unix scripting** for test automation processes, achieving greater efficiency and reliability in test execution.
Facilitated cross-functional communication to ensure alignment in quality assurance efforts, resulting in improved reporting processes and feedback loops in **Microsoft Office** tools.
Defined and enforced best practices for test case management and defect tracking, utilizing **Git** for version control and collaboration in test repository management, enhancing team accountability and transparency.
Conducted performance testing to assess system scalability and responsiveness under heavy load conditions, reporting findings to stakeholders with clear, actionable recommendations for improvement.

Conducted comprehensive **API testing** for financial platforms, including REST and SOAP services, ensuring data integrity and functionality across **Java** and other core technologies.
Executed **data migration** activities using SQL and RDBMS, successfully migrating over **10 million** records with zero data loss while maintaining operational continuity.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Agile methodologies** and tools like **Atlassian Confluence** and **JIRA** to streamline testing processes and track project progress effectively.
Developed and maintained automated test scripts using **Selenium** and **JUnit** for comprehensive regression testing, resulting in a **30%** reduction in testing time and quick turnaround for release cycles.
Created detailed documentation and test cases in a **Cucumber** framework for both manual and automated tests, ensuring all scenarios were covered and regulatory requirements were met.
Implemented Unix scripting for test automation, improving system interactions and enhancing the testing environment for various applications.
Utilized **Git** for version control, ensuring collaboration among team members and maintaining up-to-date code repositories for test scripts and configurations.
Analyzed test results and reported findings to stakeholders through clear communication, facilitating effective decision-making and driving quality improvements in software releases.

Conducted comprehensive **API testing** utilizing **REST** and **SOAP** protocols to ensure optimal functionality of backend systems integrated with **Java** applications.
Developed and executed automated test scripts using **Selenium** and **Cucumber** to enhance test coverage and efficiency, achieving a 30% reduction in regression testing time.
Collaborated with development teams on data migration efforts, applying **RDBMS** and **SQL** techniques to maintain data integrity and ensure smooth transitions between environments, successfully handling over **1 million** records.
Utilized **JSON** and **XML** for data serialization and validation in API testing, streamlining data exchange processes and improving test accuracy.
Implemented Unix scripting to automate repetitive test tasks and environment setups, leading to a **25%** improvement in overall testing efficiency.
Led efforts in Agile methodologies, participating in sprint planning and daily stand-ups to align development and testing activities and ensure timely delivery of features with minimal bugs.
Utilized **Git** for version control in collaboration with team members, maintaining comprehensive documentation in **Atlassian Confluence** and managing tasks effectively with **JIRA** and **ADO**.
Performed cross-browser testing and debugging, documenting results and communicating findings effectively to stakeholders to drive necessary improvements.
Engaged in DevOps practices, promoting continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes through automated testing frameworks, reducing deployment time by **40%**.
Demonstrated strong analytical and communication skills to liaise between technical and non-technical teams, ensuring thorough understanding of testing requirements and product specifications.
